post:
We have been providing fully managed hosting services with 24/7 customer support, including billing more than 11 years. We offer a good range of virtual private servers that setup on vLite and Hyper-V virtualization platform. Note: we are also offering 25% Flat discount on R1Soft CDP backup solution so you can keep your data protected at off-site location as well. To avail this offer use coupon code: R1SOB25
